verbs.description: President Trump [V: will] award the nation 's highest award for heroism to a World War II soldier who repelled a German attack .
[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: award] [ARG1: the nation 's highest award for heroism] [ARG2: to a World War II soldier who repelled a German attack] .
President Trump will award the nation 's highest award for heroism to [ARG0: a World War II soldier] [R-ARG0: who] [V: repelled] [ARG1: a German attack] .
